name: Color Ladder
description:
- Flex your dexterity in an instant arcade classic, bursting with color!
- Slide your color-bar to catch the matching falling colors!
- 40 fast-paced, vibrant levels great for casual players, and those looking to test their skills!
- Buttery-smooth controls help you master the art of perfect timing, and sharpen your reflexes!


If you have any issues, comments, concerns, or you just want to say hi and show us some love, email us at fun@simplemachine.co- Calming, atmospheric soundtrack to get you in the zone!
